title: Абонент временно недоступен...
overview: Lana has everything every woman dreams of: a family, a child, a business. But her husband's betrayal turns her whole life upside down...Deep depression and, as a consequence, amnesia, lead a young woman to an unfamiliar family, in which she is mistaken for another... Meanwhile, her husband deprives her of everything she had.Will someone else's life become her own for Lana or will she "resurrect from the dead"? Will she forgive her husband's betrayal or is she destined for a new love?...
